Do you know any other code or something too use instead? abit easier 1 with less errors ftw?! :o[br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2007, 11:26:12 AM[/size][hr]Omfg lescape i made it be 6 errors left !

Item2.java:126: class, interface, or enum expected public static int Abby[] = {4151, 1215, 4587, 1149, 6568, 1079, 1127}; ^ Item2.java:128: class, interface, or enum expected public static int randomAbby() ^ Item2.java:131: class, interface, or enum expected } → ^ Item3.java:43: class, interface, or enum expected public static int Abby[] = {4151, 1215, 4587, 1149, 6568, 1079, 1127}; ^ Item3.java:45: class, interface, or enum expected public static int randomAbby() ^ Item3.java:48: class, interface, or enum expected } → ^ 6 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue...

Ooh and new npchandler code !

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1615) { ItemHandler.addItem(4151, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

item.title: Help on random drops from npc
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

NPChandler.java 20 lines up and down, middle is the code.
Up(with code):

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 188) { ItemHandler.addItem(16, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 795) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.IQ(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1625 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1604 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2035) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomSlayeritem65(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1625 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1604) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomSlayeritem75(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 110) { ItemHandler.addItem(6384, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1605) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomSlayer99item(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 54 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1604) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomBD(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1192) { ItemHandler.addItem(3228, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1615) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomAbby(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);

Down: with code

[code]if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1615) {
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomAbby(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2058)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(1961, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 139)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(1037, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1007)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(1037, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(1961, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2056)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(6654, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(6655, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(6656, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(6657, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(6658, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(6659, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType >= 2591 && npcs[NPCID].npcType <= 2741) {
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.Obby(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.Obby(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.Obby(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.Obby(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.Obby(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(6570, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
}
[/code]

item.title: Help on random drops from npc
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

ok cut out

public static int Abby[] = {4151, 1215, 4587, 1149, 6568, 1079, 1127};

    public static int randomAbby()
    {
	return Abby[(int)(Math.random()*Abby.length)];
    }

from your item3 and add it to item2, then in

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1615) { 
ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomAbby(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}

replace that with

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1615) { 
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomAbby(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}

item.title: Help on random drops from npc
item.dc:creator: @Kitno Kitno
item.description:
@Kitno wrote:

[quote=“LeScape Pk, post:5, topic:104624”][quote author=Kitno link=topic=149708.msg1418955#msg1418955 date=1180818923]
Shouldn’t stuff like NPCID be an id?
[/quote]
Wow dude, you’re retarted. treez, replace this

Item3.randomABBYDEMON()
public static int ABBYDEMON[] = {4151,1215,4587,1149,6568,1079,1127};
	public static int randomABBYDEMON()
	{
		return ABBYDEMON[(int)(Math.random()*ANY NAME YOU WANT.length)];
	}

with this

Item3.randomAbby()
public static int Abby[] = {4151,1215,4587,1149,6568,1079,1127};
	public static int randomAbby()
	{
		return Abby[(int)(Math.random()*Abby.length)];
	}

and replace

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1615) 
{
ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomABBYDEMON(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}

with this

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1615) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomAbby(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } [/quote]

I wasn’t paying attention. Still half asleep.

item.source: Help on random drops from npc

item.title: Help on random drops from npc
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

Kitno:

Shouldn’t stuff like NPCID be an id?

Wow dude, you’re retarted. treez, replace this

Item3.randomABBYDEMON()
public static int ABBYDEMON[] = {4151,1215,4587,1149,6568,1079,1127};
	public static int randomABBYDEMON()
	{
		return ABBYDEMON[(int)(Math.random()*ANY NAME YOU WANT.length)];
	}

with this

Item3.randomAbby()
public static int Abby[] = {4151,1215,4587,1149,6568,1079,1127};
	public static int randomAbby()
	{
		return Abby[(int)(Math.random()*Abby.length)];
	}

and replace

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1615) 
{
ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomABBYDEMON(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}

with this

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1615) {
ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomAbby(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}

Read full topic
